p: The concept of accepting chronic illness goes well beyond the sphere of endometriosis. ACT is a form of evidence-based psychotherapy that aims to increase psychological flexibility ( Wetherell et al., 2011 ). In other words, the goal is to give patients the knowledge to recognize internal and external triggering events or experiences (e.g. pain) and equipping them with appropriate and useful thoughts and behaviors ( Kuba and Wei√üflog, 2017).
